required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vascular Closure Device in Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement
clinical_study.official_title: Plug-based Percutaneous Vascular Closure Device in Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of the safety and efficacy of a percutaneous plug-based large-bore vascular closure device for femoral artery closure in an unselected consecutive patient cohort undergoing transcatheter aortic valve implantation in a single-center prospective study.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with major vascular complications
primary_outcome.description: Major vascular access site complications according to the VARC-2 definitions

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with minor vascular complications
secondary_outcome.description: Minor vascular access site complications according to the VARC-2 definitions

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with vascular closure device failure
secondary_outcome.description: Percutaneous vascular closure device failure according to the VARC-2 definitions

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with life-threatening, disabling or major bleeding
secondary_outcome.description: Life-threatening, disabling or major bleeding complications according to the BARC definitions

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients undergoing transfemoral TAVI with MANTA closure
arm_group.description: Patients undergoing transfemoral transcatheter aortic valve replacement with femoral access site closure using the novel plug-based vascular closure device (MANTA, Teleflex/Essential Medical Inc., Malvern, Pennsylvania, USA).

intervention.description: Femoral access site closure using the MANTA closure device
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients undergoing transfemoral TAVI with MANTA closure

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients undergoing TAVI at the Karolinska University Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing transfemoral TAVI at the Karolinska University Hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing TAVI with access other than transfemoral
- Use of closure device other than MANTA

facility.name: Department of Cardiology, Karolinska University Hospital
